hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: اعود عالكرسي، بدي إسألك كم سؤال۔
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Sit on the chair, I need to ask you some questions.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: The MSA equivalent of this keyword is /ijilis/.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Sit on the chair, I need to ask you some questions.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Do not enter, wait at the door.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: The root of this keyword is /estannan/.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Do not enter, wait at the door.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Come here, you should be in line.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: This verb usually accompanies the word /lahon/, meaning here.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Come here, you should be in line.

hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: مو كتير أمان هون، روح عالسيارة۔
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: It is not safe here, go to the car.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: Listen carefully to the fifth word in this sentence.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: It is not safe here, go to the car.

hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: وئّف عند البوابة، راح يجوا ياخدوك من هنيك۔
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Stop by the gate, they will escort you from there.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: Pay attention to the first word of the sentence.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Stop by the gate, they will escort you from there.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Put down the backpack here, we need to inspect it.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: The first letter on this keyword (hard H), has no English counterpart.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Put down the backpack here, we need to inspect it.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Pick up the backpack and move to the next window.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: This is the action of lifting something, usually with the hands.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Pick up the backpack and move to the next stand.

hs:item.hs:phrase_tl: ما عم بفهم، احكي شوي شوي۔
hs:item.hs:phrase_en: I don't understand, speak more slowly.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: The keyword command is right before /shwai shwai/(slowly).
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: I don't understand, speak more slowly.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: It is very important, listen to me.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: This keyword is the forth word in the sentence.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: It is very important, listen to me.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: It's too hot in here, open the window.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: It's too hot in here, open the window.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: It's too cold in here, close the window.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: This keyword is the forth word in the sentence and starts with the letter /saad/.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: It's too cold in here, close the window.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: It's too dark, turn on the lights.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: Pay attention to the first word of the sentence.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: It's too dark, turn on the lights.

hs:item.hs:hint_l1: This command starts with the letter /Tah/ that has no English equivalent.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Load the boxes, we need to deliver these.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: The first letter on this keyword (hard H), has no English counterpart.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Load the boxes, we need to deliver these.

hs:item.hs:phrase_en: Unload the cargo and move these to the office.
hs:item.hs:hint_l1: This command starts with the letter /noon/.
hs:item.hs:feedback_l1: This means: Unload the cargo and move these to the office.
